Nov. 8, 2008 D US Open Brass Band Championships
US Open Brass Band Championships 0 Entertainments Contest
us-open-brass-band-championships
First Contest 2003.
Norris Cultural Arts Center, St. Charles, Illinois, USA Most entertaining band: Ohio Brass Band Best cornet of the day: Tony Philipp (Ohio Brass Band) Best featured brass soloist: Nate Gay (euphonium, Fountain City Brass Band) Best performance of a march: Brass Band of Central Florida Best new composition or arrangement: Esprit de Corps (played by Eastern Iowa Brass Band) Most outstanding percussion section: Brass Band of Central Florida
June 5, 2009, 12:57 p.m. Oct. 15, 2014, 10:36 a.m.
1 Fountain City Brass Joseph Parisi

4 Dublin Silver Band Paul Droste
5 Madison Brass Band Craig Mason
